column5: Very sorry to hear this news Gary. I recall how important Amy was in your life and she will surely be missed. My condolences.
Saddened to learn about your loss.  My condolences to you and your family.  John
sorry to hear i know how you feel i have 14 best friends
So sorry Gary.  Me deepest condolences to you. My dog will get an extra scratch when I get home tonite
they truly become part of the family we feel your loss

So sorry to hear this Gary .went thru this myself last yr at this time ,its never a good thing and like said earlier looking over the pictures it still hurts alot,getting a new pup and making new memories helped alot Gary,again sorry for your loss

Gary, I am so sorry to hear of Amy's passing. I remember about a year ago when it was touch and go for a while and we all breathed a sigh of relief when she pulled through. I guess God just needed another special dog too much this time! Keep strong my friend and keep her memories alive in your heart.

That's pretty rough for sure. Sorry to hear about a lost friend. Dogs make the best friends. I'll give my old guy a hug in her memory. My buddy is on his last legs too, he has a disease which deteriorates the nerve leading from the spine to his hips / legs. He can barely walk but is in zero pain. When he can't get up anymore it'll be time to say goodbye. I figure he has a couple months at best. Life can be a real carp at times. Just remember the good times you had, they will outweigh the sadness.  God Bless,  Hookset.
sorry about your loss.
Ahh geez Gary, Im really sorry, I too have met Amy.  Im sure she will be missed....
im sooo sorry to hear your lost your pal.  Its never easy losing the furry ones!  All the best!
reading stuff like this it makes me sad. Sorry for your loss gary  two years ago My Doberman named Chess Died of old age. He was 14.5 years old. It felt as if i lost a really close brother.
Sorry to her about your loss.They never can be replaced but i'm sure ther is another one out there that needs you just as much as amy did.
Sorry to hear... my deepest condolences Gary
I am truly sorry to hear that Gary, my condolances...
Very sorry to hear Gary, keep your chin up.

Those of you that have been around know about my dog Amy's medical problems in the past and the 2 major surgeries she has been through.  Today she had to have another operation because of the problem reoccurring.  I just got a phone call that she passed on the operating table.  She was my best friend, closest companion, and loved everybody she came into contact with.  Look at my avatar, then go pet your dog or cat in her memory, animals are a very special  part of many of our lives.
Sorry to hear about your loss...     loosing a pet is like loosing a family member.     my condolences
Geez Louize Gary,  My heartfelt condolonces to your family.  Chin up,  reefrunner

Sorry to hear that Gary,  it's been over a year since I lost my best friend Hershey, I still miss her!!! Dogs are special with the unconditional love the give, they just want to make you happy, most times they do.
Terrible news, Gary. I KNOW how special she was to you....and you to her obviously.  Hang tight Bud.
what a shame... she looks like she was a beautiful dog... my sincere condolences... so hard to lose a best friend! take comfort in the good times you had with her bullybass

I like to believe there is a special place in heaven that has been reserved for all of our faithful companions, complete with favorite treats and toys.  Please accept our condolences in the loss of your beloved Amy.  The memories you created will always be with you.   Cliff and Carole & Harley
Sorry to hear Gary,they are special to us all.  BM

That's awe full news Gary. I was fortunate enough to have met Amy, all be it very briefly and can attest to her not only being a beautiful dog, but quite obviously a very dear companion to you. You have my heartfelt sympathies... it will be a tough go, but remember those good times. HH
Very sorry to hear Gary.  That's a tough way to lose her. My condolences.

So Sorry to hear that!  We lost our dog 5 years ago, and when i see pictures of her today my eyes start to water and i start to remember all the crazy things she used to do. Losing a best friend is not easy!  Please accept my deepest condolences!  Anders
Take care Gary, she'll always be in your memories..

Gary, I'm so truely sorry to hear of Amy passing.  I know how much you loved her and her company.  My condolances to you.  I can't imagine losing my beloved Felix.  He is quite old himself now and getting a little crankier, but we are a team and I will be lost when he passes, as I'm sure you are right now.  Sorry Gary  Joey
Terrible news Gary.  Very sorry for your loss.  Treasure the memories as they do live on forever.
Very sorry to hear that!!!  I just lost my 2 (brother and sister) in the last few months.....takes time to get over them that's for sure!!!!   Chrispy!
Very sorry to hear about your loss of Amy. The second I read this I went right over to my dog Sierra and gave her a huge hug and kiss.  Especially considering they could pass for twins!

My condolences....We have a 15 yr. old Border Collie that is getting close.....  I got her when I came home from Playing hockey. She has been around longer than my wife.  It is gonna be a sad day at our house when I have to take for her last "Ride in the Truck"
Gary, so sorry to hear about Amy.
I'm sorry, Gary.
Sorry for your loss Gary.
So sorry to hear it Gary. It is certainly a special relationship that we have with our canine and feline friends. When we must let them go their memories stay with us for ever.  J...
So sorry to hear about your loss. If I lost my Suzy.. I don't know how I could handle it.
Really terrible news. Very sorry for your loss Gary. Take solace in knowing you did all humanly possible to help Amy along.  Sincerely, 1leg
Terriby sorry to hear Garry and know what you're going through having lost our beloved Fraser last week.

So sorry to hear that Gary. I dont have a dog, but have 3 cats and i cant stand the thought of losing any of them, like all have said , they are part of the family, and true friends and companions.  I offer my deepest sympathies and condolences to you .   Simon
